item.title: Project 1: Estimation of Healthcare cost and Healthcare Quality in OECD Countries
item.description: Statistical modelling helps us to determine where our research needs to be focused and realize the factors that impact the healthcare quality and expenses. The main objective of our research and analysis is to understand how to minimize the health expenses while improving or maintaining the same health quality. Collection of data and data source play a paramount role in the analysis. we have built our own dataset by taking the data from reliable resources such as OECD and WHO after analyzing the literature.
